content: this printable pdf deer crochet pattern includes written and detailed photo instructions i have a free simplified version of the pattern and a video tutorial for this deer fawn on my website 1 this pdf pattern is simply for those of you who prefer a pdf version of the pattern that can be accessed offline or printed this downloadable pdf pattern has detailed step-by-step instructions that are accompanied by high quality photos of the process the woodland crochet pattern includes photo tutorials on how to make a magic_ring invisible decreases in single_crochet and closing small rounds **size** if using the recommended yarn weight and hook size your amigurumi deer will be about 3 / 7 6cm tall and long **construction ** the fawn is crocheted from bottom to top the legs are crocheted on the ears head and tail are sewn on the nose and markings are embroidered **required materials and tools ** * cotton yarn in a dk / light worsted weight in brown and white * 2 5mm crochet hook / size b-1 or c-2 depending on how tightly you crochet * 5mm safety eyes or black embroidery floss * black embroidery floss * fiberfill * stitch markers * yarn needle * large eyed sewing needle * pins * scissors **language ** english us i m always happy to help don t hesitate to message me here on ravelry or email me at stellasyarnuniverse at outlook com if you need help with the download or the pattern thank you for stopping by happy creating 1 https //stellasyarnuniverse com/amigurumi-deer-free-crochet-pattern/
